import { useState } from "react" import Upgrades from "./Upgrades" function HelperShop({incrementDps, totalMoney, updateMoney}) { const currentMoney = useState(totalMoney) console.log(currentMoney) function purchaseHelper(cost, dps) { console.log(currentMoney,cost) if(currentMoney-cost<0) return updateMoney(cost*-1) incrementDps(dps) } return (

purchaseHelper(cost, dps)} /> this.handleLuckUpgrade(cost)} /> this.handleMoneyCountUpgrade(cost)} />
) } export default HelperShop
